import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Plat } from 'src/app/models/plat.models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-plat', templateUrl: './plat.component.html', styleUrls: ['./plat.component.css'] }) export class PlatComponent { protected plat:Plat[]=[]; }
